ygData.subject: Re: How are people getting the white scales?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Faras..  you can find out what s going on with Vox and scale in this thread: http://vnboards.ign.com/message.asp?topic=11909687&replies=25 It s something
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Faras.. you can find out what's going on with Vox and scale in
this thread:

http://vnboards.ign.com/message.asp?topic=11909687&replies=25

It's something that's being discussed in the E'Ci community.

Laluni

--- In eqbards@y..., Mike.Roach@q... wrote:
> Hmm, I can't attest to the skill of the current Vox raiders on E'ci
since I
> have not been on one yet but it seems to me that from what I
observe (and I
> keep my ears open) many of the Vox raids on our server end in
wipeouts and
> failures, at least ones that people I know are involved in.
>
> Ahh well, how much to white scales sell for on E'ci these days,
anyone know?
>
> -Faras
